data.name: Dying Light 2 - Deluxe Upgrade
data.detailed_description:
Upgrade your Standard Edition to get the Deluxe content.

The upgrade contains:
  • Access to a story DLC that will be available in the months after the release
  • Exclusive weapon charm
  • Wallpapers ready to print
  • Digital comic
  • "Legendary" outfit
  • "Legendary" renewable weapons
  • "Legendary" paraglider skin
data.about_the_game:
Upgrade your Standard Edition to get the Deluxe content.

The upgrade contains:
  • Access to a story DLC that will be available in the months after the release
  • Exclusive weapon charm
  • Wallpapers ready to print
  • Digital comic
  • "Legendary" outfit
  • "Legendary" renewable weapons
  • "Legendary" paraglider skin
data.short_description: Looking to enhance your Dying Light 2 Stay Human experience? Upgrade from Standard to Deluxe edition and get your hands on extra content, in-game items, and unique skins now!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Korean, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian*, Spanish - Latin America*, Arabic, Czech, Japanese*, Portuguese, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-9100 / AMD Ryzen 3 2300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon™ RX 560 (4GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: AMD / Intel CPU running at 3.6 GHz or higher: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X or Intel i5-8600K or newer
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 2060 6GB or AMD RX Vega 56 8GB or newer
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
